verses.roman:
teṅha yāṅra pada-dhūli karena prārthana
svarūpera saṅge pāiluṅ e saba śikṣaṇa

synonyms: teṅha—he; yāṅra—whose; pada-dhūli—dust of the lotus feet; karena prārthana—desires; svarūpera saṅge—from Svarūpa Dāmodara; pāiluṅ—I have gotten; e saba—all these; śikṣaṇa—instructions.
translation: "Uddhava desires to take on his head the dust of the gopīs' lotus feet. I have learned about all these transcendental loving affairs of Lord Kṛṣṇa from Svarūpa Dāmodara.
